alert.note: Alert for Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 1:38PM MST until January 04 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MONDAY TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches over Marias Pass with higher amounts above 7000 feet. Snow accumulation up to 2 inches below 5000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...From 2 PM Monday to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact travel over Marias Pass. In addition, dangerous wind chills are likely Tuesday as much colder air moves back south into the area.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
